Package com.newmusic.web.resource

Class MusicResource

java.lang.Object
com.newmusic.web.resource.MusicResource
@Path("/music") public class MusicResource extends Object
Calls MusicService to interact with the database and send back the requested information, or an error if it can't.
Author:
Yang Mattew, Wu Jingyi
